CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 16, 1952, pg. 6 reads: "Shooting Suspect - Lawrence Robinson, now serving a workhouse term for a burglary in Franklin County, was held for court on a charge of felonious assault with intent to kill following a hearing at Morals Court Wednesday morning. Robinson (left) was identified by Janet Mackrell (right) as the man who shot and critically wounded her Jan. 9, 1951.  Shown also are city detective Clem Bartirome and Detective inspector Adam Geisler. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Detective Clem Bartirome, detective inspector Adam Geisler, and shooting victim Janet Mackrell, standing at judge's bench in Morals Court, Allegheny County Courthouse
